description: React component module defining a UI sheet component with various subcomponents and styling, utilizing Radix UI primitives and utility functions.

classes.name: SheetOverlay
classes.description: React component for overlay with animated fade-in/out effects.

classes.name: SheetContent
classes.description: Main content component of the sheet with slide-in/out animations based on side position.

classes.name: SheetHeader
classes.description: Header container for the sheet, styled with flex layout.

classes.name: SheetFooter
classes.description: Footer container for the sheet, styled with flex layout.

classes.name: SheetTitle
classes.description: Title component for the sheet, styled as a heading.

classes.name: SheetDescription
classes.description: Description text component for the sheet.

methods.name: React.forwardRef
methods.description: Creates React components that can accept refs, used for overlay, content, title, and description components.
